title: Todos
descr: This project allows the user to create a user, add new blogposts, edit or delete existing blogposts, like blogpostst. The posts have different categories, the user can filter them. Used technologies for this project: Javascript, React, Firebase.

title: Traveller
descr: This project is a travel agencies webpage. The user can read the different pages, look for a tour, click on the cards for details.

title: Movies
descr: This project works with different databases, the webpage is a collection of actors, movies, series. The items are sorted by popularity, and the user can search for them.
